titleStmt.title: A declaration of the gentlemen and inhabitants of the county of Brecknock, concerning their firm resolutions for the Parliament, in adhering to the judgement and determination thereof, as to the supream court of judicature of the kingdom. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that the declaration of the gentlemen and inhabitants of the county of Brecknock, of Nov. 23. 1645. be forthwith printed and published. H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Gwyn, H.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Husband, printer to the Honorable House of Commons, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Golden Dragon in Fleetstreet, neer the Inner-Temple,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: H: Gwyn [and 33 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Golden Dragon in Fleetstreet, neer the Inner-Temple
